heading: Our Portfolio
subheading: Real results from real projects. See how we've helped organizations transform their operations

projects.title: Academic Institute Digitization
projects.description: Complete digital transformation of a multi-campus educational institution with 5,000+ students. Implemented teacher panels, online fee payment, automated scheduling, and parent communication systems.

projects.title: Business Workflow Automation
projects.description: Streamlined operations for a manufacturing company by automating inventory management, order processing, and supplier communications. Reduced processing time by 60%.

projects.title: Corporate Digital Presence
projects.description: Built a comprehensive digital ecosystem for a consulting firm including website, client portal, and automated marketing workflows. Increased lead generation by 150%.

projects.title: WhatsApp Business Automation
projects.description: Developed an intelligent WhatsApp automation system for a retail chain to handle customer inquiries, order updates, and promotional campaigns. Serves 10,000+ customers monthly.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Created a full-featured e-commerce platform with inventory management, payment processing, and customer analytics. Processed $500K+ in transactions in the first year.

projects.title: Event Management System
projects.description: Built a modern event management platform for conference organizers. Features include registration, ticketing, scheduling, and attendee engagement tools.
